page.title: 10GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: We did a survey to discover the most popular games in our school,here are the top 15. NETBALL (48); CYCLING (42); PLASTICINE (39); COMPUTER GAMES (38); BOARD GAMES (37); CARD GAMES (37); TENNIS (32); FOOTBALL (31); HOPSCOTCH (28); CRICKET (26); PARTY GAMES (26); HANGMAN ETC (26); PUZZLES (25); B.M.X.ING (24); SKIPPING (23). For school games the girls play Netball and the boys play football on their playing field, called The Triangle. The School also has a Chess team, which plays in the local Primary Schools Chess League. There is one safe play area in Otterton, called the Jubillee Playing Field. It has a collection of wooden items of equipment like slides,frames and see-saws. Lord Clinton opened it. Research by Anne Tindale & Emily Ewins
